description: Wear the ROM Hoody for cold days at the crag or cold drinks with friends. Built with GORE-TEX® Infinium™ Windstopper® it blocks frigid gusts without compromising breathability. A true softshell, it’ll shed rain in a pinch, but its specialty is moving comfortably on cool to cold clear days.
name: Marmot ROM GTX Infinium Hoody - Mens
